reviewText: wasn't the best movie but ok
Love this movie! This is one of my favorites! Again, love it! This movie is a great family favorite!
Thank you for a very moving movie and great family entertainment!

It took me back to the late 40's when I was a young man working on the fishing trawlers out of Halifax NS. That style boat was the latest and greatest at that time. They were all named "Cape" something or other owned by National Seafoods. My old trawler was the Rayon D'Or, it was an antique compared to those new modern boats
I love buying these movies, I got a lot of moves and im buying to replace a lot we lost in our moving

I like this movie and would recommend this to all to see.
Shows the difficulty and trials that fishermen have to go
through when they rely on the sea as an income. I only wish
there were more movies, like this one, that teach people the
realism of life in general.
Good Movie. This was a good family movie to watch. Had a very good ending. Great cast of people was in the movie.

A wonderful movie. Can be watched by the whole family but has some intense scenes that may be disturbing. The acting is great and the story is great.

A father and son's relationship is put to the test when the son finds out his father has been up to things that are so legal. In the end the boy has a choice to make.
